message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth $120 to us. Considering its value, I am offering it to you for $100. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product. However, $100 is still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. This is the absolute maximum I can afford right now. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I'm glad you're interested in our product. I'd like to make a counteroffer at $90 for the product. This is a bit higher than your offer but still reflects the value we place on it. I hope this works for you.
